# The Best Bitcoin Wallet

The best online Bitcoin Wallet to buy, store and manage your BTC for iOS and
Android.

Hanna HuggExplore your wallet!from Freewallet teamRead more...Oct 17, 20230
BTCloading...Oct 18, 2023– 0Pay Outto 34Jd...KemMPay Infrom Anonymous Sender\+
0CompleteComplete21:46

## Download Bitcoin Wallet

Setup the Bitcoin wallet on your Android or iOS device and make the most of
your mobile Bitcoin wallet app. Store and manage digital gold at any moment,
all around the world. Backed up and synced with the blockchain network, the
mobile BTC wallet is ready for use. Create a blockchain wallet just by logging
in with your email, Facebook, Gmail or mobile number. For those who prefer to
use their PC or laptop, we have a desktop BTC wallet available via the
website. You can access your wallet with Windows, OSX, Ubuntu and other Linux
based OS. Exchange BTC

Bitcoin

Loading graph data

## Enjoy BTC storage in your way

  * Store your money in a free Bitcoin wallet with a simple interface.
  * Use it on mobile devices with iOS or Android.
  * Buy Bitcoin with your credit or debit card for USD or EUR right in the app.
  * Top-up your mobile phone balance with Bitcoin.
  * Choose the most suitable transaction fee and send BTC fast or cheap.
  * Enjoy fee-free transactions within the Freewallet ecosystem.
  * Fund your wallet with almost any cryptocurrency and exchange BTC in the app.
  * Manage your BTC with the Freewallet website on OSX, Windows, Ubuntu and other Linux based OS.

## Secure Bitcoin Wallet with multi-level protection

Freewallet combines the best security practices with encryption to protect
your private keys and digital assets. Your BTC is under strong protection and
only accessible to you, even if you lose your phone, thanks to advanced
security features.  
We at Freewallet are always implementing new functions to improve the safety
of your funds and ensure that only you can access your account.Learn more

Multi signature confirmation for each transaction

Limits per day/week to help minimize the risk of theft

Coins are held in a cold storage

2FA, pin-code and Fingerprint support

## FAQ

## Support Center

We understand that blockchain is not the easiest thing to grasp. Our support
team is here to guide you through all the steps of your cryptocurrency journey
and help to puzzle it out:

We are helpful

5 hours — average time it takes to resolve an issue.

We are prompt

30 minutes — average ticket response time.

We are multilingual

Team of 15 people, who understand English, French, Italian, Chinese and more
languages, responds to your requests 24/7.

We are easily accessible​

Contact us via all your favorite ways of communication: Skype, Telegram,
Facebook messenger, and email.

We are mindful

Visit our thorough Support Center with all possible questions and answers.

## About Freewallet's Bitcoin Wallet

Bitcoin is the most popular cryptocurrency with the biggest market
capitalization. It has triggered the boom of cryptocurrencies and become a
starting point for many blockchain projects. BTC was designed to be a
decentralized p2p payment system without financial intermediates, but today it
has become a digital gold for millions of hodlers. Freewallet provides
cryptocurrency wallets for 100+ coins and tokens for the web, iOS and Android
devices; 30+ standalone apps dedicated to a single cryptocurrency; and
Freewallet Lite – an HD wallet for iOS and Android.

Try FreewalletLearn more

# Freewallet Account Fees

Back to top

WebiOSAndroid

Last update

2022-11-05

Freewallet is the most user-friendly crypto service on the market. We provide
our customers with the best exchange rates, zero in-app fees, fast app and web
performance and many other options to explore the crypto world.  
  
The monthly fee for Your Freewallet Account maintenance is 10 USDT or its
equivalent in another crypto asset due for payment starting from 13th month
from opening an account with Us. The due amount will be automatically deducted
from Your Wallet. There is no action required from your end.  
  
Those accounts that are consistently active for 12 immediately preceding
months, e.g. perform transactions or login authorizations in the Wallet, shall
be rewarded with free maintenance account for the period of adherence to the
activity requirements.  
  
Those terms are subject to any amendments at our discretion as we may deem
necessary from time to time.
